com.github.webapp_minifier

Class DefaultTagHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.webapp_minifier.DefaultTagHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DirectiveHandler, NodeHandler

    public class DefaultTagHandler
extends Object
implements NodeHandler, DirectiveHandler
    This class provides the default NodeHandler implementation. It directs the minification of code into the appropriate files.
    Author:
    Lonny

      • minifyExternalCode

        protected String minifyExternalCode(String urlString,
                        MinificationContext context)
                             throws FileNotFoundException,
                                    IOException
        Minifies the external code.
        Parameters:
        urlString - the URL to the external code.
        compressor - the compressor to use.
        builder - the builder for the compressed files.
        Returns:
        the original URL or the file name containing the minified code.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if the minified file could not be created.
        IOException - if any other error occurred while writing to the minified file.

      • minifyEmbedded

        protected String minifyEmbedded(String text,
                    boolean skipEmbedded,
                    boolean mergeEmbedded,
                    MinificationContext context,
                    MinifiedFileMetrics metrics)
                         throws FileNotFoundException,
                                IOException
        Minifies the embedded CSS or JavaScript.
        Parameters:
        text - the CSS or JavaScript to minify.
        skipEmbedded - indicates if minification should be skipped.
        mergeEmbedded - indicates if the embedded code should be merged with an external file.
        compressor - the compressor to use.
        builder - the builder for the compressed files.
        metrics - the place to store metrics about minification.
        Returns:
        the minified result or null if it was added to another file.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if the minified file could not be created.
        IOException - if any other error occurred while writing to the minified file.

      • minify

        protected String minify(com.googlecode.htmlcompressor.compressor.Compressor compressor,
            String input,
            File destinationFile,
            MinifiedFileMetrics metrics)
                 throws FileNotFoundException,
                        IOException
        Minifies the input using the provided compressor.
        Parameters:
        compressor - the compressor
        input - the input to be minified.
        destinationFile - the destination file.
        metrics - the place to store metrics about minification.
        Returns:
        the destination file name if the file was created or null if the minified output was appended to the file.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if the file exists but is a directory rather than a regular file, does not exist but cannot be created, or cannot be opened for any other reason.
        IOException - if an error occurs while copying the minified output to the file.
